wexpman.servicelayer.services.impl

Class ExperimentMonitoringServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • wexpman.servicelayer.services.impl.ExperimentMonitoringServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutomaticMonitoring, ExperimentMonitoringService

    public class ExperimentMonitoringServiceImpl
extends Object
implements ExperimentMonitoringService, AutomaticMonitoring
    This class implements a service class intended to provide experiment status and result tracking services
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExperimentCaseResult getResult(ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
      Gets the result of the given case
      ExperimentResult getResult(ExperimentInfo experiment)
      Gets the current result of the given experiment
      ExperimentCaseStatus getStatus(ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
      Gets the status of the given case
      ExperimentStatus getStatus(ExperimentInfo experiment)
      Gets the status of the given experiment
      void retrieveResults()
      Fetches results for existing experiments so that they can be made available locally and any associated hooks are executed This method is designed to be invoked on a periodic fashion
      void setDaoLocator(DAOLocator daoLocator)
      Sets a reference to a locator for DAOs, which will be used to get stored experiment information in order to retrieve results during automatic monitoring

        public void retrieveResults()
        Description copied from interface: AutomaticMonitoring
        Fetches results for existing experiments so that they can be made available locally and any associated hooks are executed This method is designed to be invoked on a periodic fashion

      • setDaoLocator

        public void setDaoLocator(DAOLocator daoLocator)
        Description copied from interface: AutomaticMonitoring
        Sets a reference to a locator for DAOs, which will be used to get stored experiment information in order to retrieve results during automatic monitoring
        Specified by:
        setDaoLocator in interface AutomaticMonitoring
        Parameters:
        daoLocator - the DAOLocator instance to store a reference to
        See Also:

      • getResult

        public ExperimentResult getResult(ExperimentInfo experiment)
                           throws ExperimentQueryException,
                                  ExperimentDataManipulationException,
                                  ExperimentConcurrentAccessException
        Description copied from interface: ExperimentMonitoringService
        Gets the current result of the given experiment
        Specified by:
        getResult in interface ExperimentMonitoringService
        Parameters:
        experiment - the experiment to query for its result (as of the moment of querying)
        Returns:
        the result of the given experiment
        Throws:
        ExperimentQueryException - if the result could not be obtained from the native system
        ExperimentDataManipulationException - if the experiment result instance to be returned could not be created due to problem trying to store the result data
        ExperimentConcurrentAccessException - if result permanent storage was being used by another instance that refers to this same experiment case, this exception indicates another attempt should be made to get the result
        See Also:
        wexpman.servicelayer.services.ExperimentMonitoringService#getResult(wexpman .domainobjects.ExperimentInfo)

      • getResult

        public ExperimentCaseResult getResult(ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
                               throws ExperimentQueryException,
                                      ExperimentDataManipulationException,
                                      ExperimentConcurrentAccessException
        Description copied from interface: ExperimentMonitoringService
        Gets the result of the given case
        Specified by:
        getResult in interface ExperimentMonitoringService
        Parameters:
        experimentCase - the case to query for its result
        Returns:
        the result of the given case if there is a result available, or null if there is no result available
        Throws:
        ExperimentQueryException - if the result could not be obtained from the native system
        ExperimentDataManipulationException - if the experiment case result instance to be returned could not be created due to problem trying to store the result data
        ExperimentConcurrentAccessException - if result permanent storage was being used by another instance that refers to this same experiment case, this exception indicates another attempt should be made to get the result
        See Also:
        wexpman.servicelayer.services.ExperimentMonitoringService#getResult(wexpman .domainobjects.ExperimentCaseInfo)

      • getStatus

        public ExperimentStatus getStatus(ExperimentInfo experiment)
                           throws ExperimentQueryException
        Description copied from interface: ExperimentMonitoringService
        Gets the status of the given experiment
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface ExperimentMonitoringService
        Parameters:
        experiment - the experiment to query for its status
        Returns:
        the status of the given experiment
        Throws:
        ExperimentQueryException - if the status of any of the experiment cases that belong to the given experiment could not be obtained
        See Also:
        wexpman.servicelayer.services.ExperimentMonitoringService#getStatus(wexpman .domainobjects.ExperimentInfo)

      • getStatus

                               throws ExperimentQueryException
        Description copied from interface: ExperimentMonitoringService
        Gets the status of the given case
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface ExperimentMonitoringService
        Parameters:
        experimentCase - the case to query for its status
        Returns:
        the status of the given case
        Throws:
        ExperimentQueryException - if the status of this experiment case could not be obtained
        See Also:
        wexpman.servicelayer.services.ExperimentMonitoringService#getStatus(wexpman .domainobjects.ExperimentCaseInfo)
